data.name: Resuffer
data.detailed_description:
In a dark time when everyone lived at the mercy of the imperial surveillance system, people were punished for their unspoken thoughts and ideologies. Until a bunch of rebellious scientists came together and made a psychedelic that renders the human mind private once again. Except that very few took the psychedelic to its completion without descending into madness. So, where will you be in all this? Among the many who lost their minds in their psychoses? Or the few who made it to the other side?

GAMEPLAY FEATURES



  • SIMPLE: The basic gameplay loop is straight forward. At the beginning of each challenge, you'll find yourself imprisoned in a chamber and your goal is to survive long enough for the escape port to unlock.

  • DYNAMIC: In this top-down, auto-runner, once you start moving you can not stop unless you win or die, yet with the ultra-responsive control, you can always turn, jump, slow the time, and even fly!

  • CHALLENGING: The more you change directions the faster you'll become, keeping things fresh all the time. Even a challenge that is so easy to beat at low speeds will be "tough as nails" at high ones.

  • PUNISHING: What makes it so hard to survive in Resuffer is the fact that if you touch anything you die instantly. There is no health to lose and no potion to gain.

  • PRECISE: The game features pixel-perfect hitboxes on everything to the point where each "cheekbone" of the rabbit you take control of detects collision separately!

  • ADDICTIVE: You'll probably spend hours trying to beat a challenge that requires you to survive for 10 seconds only! The constant acceleration and the fact that you're always so close to both winning and losing will keep you coming back for more.

  • BALANCED: While Resuffer boasts a high difficulty and encourages you to "git-gud" it has a full set of assist modifications that tailor the experience to your own taste, no matter how slow your reflexes are.

  • DIVERSE: The main campaign is packed with over 150 hand-crafted challenges divided across 12 chapters, each with a new gameplay mechanic!

  • Unconventional Storytelling: Resuffer is hyper-fast! There's no time to stop for a cutscene! That's why the lore is told through collectible cassettes, scattered throughout the game, tying how much you know of the story with how skilled you are!

data.short_description: Resuffer is an action rogue-lite where you venture through psychedelic cycles, try to survive crushingly difficult, ever-changing chambers, fight hallucinatory bosses, and smooth-talk your inner demons into reshaping your entire experience!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 equivalent or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
